reviewtext: i've been buying these for over 10 years now.  this is my third pair.  no, they are not crappy.  i traveled to less than favorable places under less than favorable conditions and beat the ever living crap out of them.  a product can only make it so far.  i don't baby my stuff.  having said all that, i have no regrets.  i love these, they are so loud you can set them on the table in a room and still hear them on full blast.  i will continue to buy this headset even when the next ones break.  LOVE THESE
